Download PySkein
================

New in version 0.3:
    * Threefish block decryption
    * Demo scripts ``skeinsum.py`` and ``threefish.py``

Download:
    * Source distribution: `pyskein-0.3.tar.gz <http://pypi.python.org/packages/source/p/pyskein/pyskein-0.3.tar.gz>`_ (`sig <http://pypi.python.org/packages/source/p/pyskein/pyskein-0.3.tar.gz.asc>`_)
    * Windows Installer: `pyskein-0.3.win32-py3.0.exe <http://pypi.python.org/packages/3.0/p/pyskein/pyskein-0.3.win32-py3.0.exe>`_ (`sig <http://pypi.python.org/packages/3.0/p/pyskein/pyskein-0.3.win32-py3.0.exe.asc>`_)


Previous versions
-----------------

* PySkein 0.2
    * New in this version:
        * Support for message authentication codes
        * Threefish block encryption (but no decryption)
        * Fixed one or two reference leaks
    * Download:
        * Source distribution: `pyskein-0.2.tar.gz <http://pypi.python.org/packages/source/p/pyskein/pyskein-0.2.tar.gz>`_ (`sig <http://pypi.python.org/packages/source/p/pyskein/pyskein-0.2.tar.gz.asc>`_)
        * Windows Installer: `pyskein-0.2.win32-py3.0.exe <http://pypi.python.org/packages/3.0/p/pyskein/pyskein-0.2.win32-py3.0.exe>`_ (`sig <http://pypi.python.org/packages/3.0/p/pyskein/pyskein-0.2.win32-py3.0.exe.asc>`_)

* PySkein 0.1
    * New in this version:
        * Skein-256, Skein-512, and Skein-1024 hashing
    * Download:
        * Source distribution: `pyskein-0.1.tar.gz <http://pypi.python.org/packages/source/p/pyskein/pyskein-0.1.tar.gz>`_ (`sig <http://pypi.python.org/packages/source/p/pyskein/pyskein-0.1.tar.gz.asc>`_)
